raw_body: Caryl Aloma Jayasuriya, born June 7, 1941, retired Deputy General Manager, People’s Bank passed away peacefully at home on November 15th, 2023. She was the loving wife of late Herbert Jayasuriya, retired Director of the Fraud Bureau. Loving mother of Dilani Bradley and Roshanthi Perera, mother in law of Ruwan Perera, devoted grandmother of Roshana and Revantha.
